name: Canasta by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Canasta on your iPad, iPhone or iPod. Compete against the computer's AI for a real challenge.

This Canasta game is played with two players, two regular packs of 52 cards, plus four jokers. Game play is fast paced. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

This game is best played on tablet devices.

Features

* Real Canasta rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
